word_mean: 韧带：连接骨或软骨，用来支撑和加强关节的一束纤维组织，见ligamentum
从某一内脏延伸到另一内脏的双层腹膜
出生后没有功能的胎儿管状结构的束状残留部分

...解剖学名词腹外斜肌肌腱的下缘增厚卷曲，连于髂前上棘(Anterior superior iliac spine)与耻骨结节(pubic tubercle)之间，称腹股沟韧带(inguinal ligament)腹股沟韧带内侧端部分纤维增厚形成陷窝韧带相关文献应用VSD技术和股前外侧皮瓣修复小腿软组织缺损-实用骨科杂志-2013年.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin ligamentum 'bond', from ligare 'to bind'

entry.def: A ligament is a band of strong tissue in a person's body which connects bones.

example.ex: He suffered torn ligaments in his knee.

means.word_mean: 1. a sheet or band of tough fibrous tissue connecting bones or cartilages or supporting muscles or organs
